about_the_game:
In the depths of black fog, vegetables are buried and waiting, the most valuable treasure for our rabbit family!
Finish the quest of each level, and fight and harvest treasure!

Dig and merge


Do you like ding-dang mining? Why not try digging vegetables?
Do you like merge? Why not try merge vegetables?
Hey,there we get vegetables.Would you eat them to replenish your energy? or take them back to the village to upgrade your powers?or save them up to make bigger ones? or…… even throw them to Smash a monster?
Ha ha ha, it's up to you.

Light strategy rouge-lite game


Each game has several randomly generated maps, and each map needs to complete a specified task before you can move to the next.
20+ kinds of monsters will give you lots of trouble, but loyal pickaxes and shiny vegetables will be your friends forever.
Plan your energy and actions so that you can adapt to the challenge.

Various skill trees and upgrades


70+ unique skill trees will make every journey enjoyable.
Deadly rocket! Quick jump! Freeze the ground! Blow the monster away!
Gather vegetables to upgrade them and create your own play style!

name: VegeMine
short_description: Under tier upon tier of dark stratas, there grows endless vegetables, dig them, merge them, then eat them! This is a rouge-lite strategy game in which you play as a rabbit digging for vegetables, increasing your power as you advance through layers until you reach the final treasure!
